mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no, r.mer_uid, r.content, r.star_cnt, r.review_date, r.review_like_cnt, r.review_image, r.product_no, r.user_no, p.product_name, u.nickname from review r left Join user_tbl u on r.user_no = u.user_no left join product p on r.product_no = p.product_no where r.user_no=#{userNo}

SELECT r.review_no, r.mer_uid, r.content, r.star_cnt, r.review_date,r.review_like_cnt, r.review_image, r.product_no, r.user_no, p.product_name, u.nickname from review r left Join user_tbl u on r.user_no = u.user_no left join product p on r.product_no = p.product_no where r.product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET content=#{content}, star_cnt=#{starCnt}, review_image=#{reviewImage} WHERE mer_uid=#{merUid} and user_no=#{UserNo}
mapper.delete: > DELETE * FROM review WHERE mer_uid=#{merUid} and user_no=#{UserNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_like_cnt=#{reviewLikeCnt}+1 WHERE review_no=#{reviewNo} and user_no=#{UserNo}
